mapper.select: select * from chat where croom_no=#{croom_no} order by chat_sendtime desc

select * from( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY c.croom_no ORDER BY chat_sendtime DESC ) RNUM, c.*,cr.croom_title FROM chat c, chatroom cr WHERE cr.croom_no=c.croom_no and cr.emp_no=#{emp_no} ) where rnum=1 order by chat_sendtime desc
